title: can't see my messages on new machine
content:
I just got a new machine running windows 11 Home, I installed thunderbird just two of my email acconts and I can't see emails. The titles are there when i try to view don't get anything. I go back to my windows 10 set up I see my messages. Thank you in advance for your help.. 

                                                                         Russell
creator: guywithgreenhair1

title: Filter Action: Hide Message?
content: Can I hide messages that meets the Filter conditions? I can't find any such Filter Action.
creator: viking2

title: Gelezen berichten
content: Sinds een paar dagen blijven berichten in de inbox vetgedrukt, ook al heb ik ze gelezen. Ik wil gelezen berichten weer in dunnere letter. Hoe krijg ik dit voor elkaar?
creator: marius.van.herpen

title: Thunderbird
content: Without any warning about half of my folders disappeared as did the icon for writing a new email, as you can tell by my lack of jargon, I am not very skilled in the world of software, just an essential user, so any suggestions welcome, up to and including a 'takeover' by one of the actual software engineers, please advise.
creator: john1095

title: incoming mail
content: I used to use Virgin email but now have Thunderbird. Over the last few days when I get a notification of new message I get it twice. How do I disable the virgin ones.
